questions.title: 扬州坐落于大运河旁边。
questions.answer: Yangzhou is located next to the Grand Canal.

questions.title: 我们的大学位于机场的旁边。
questions.answer: Our university is located next to the airport.

questions.title: 我的豪华别墅位于这个小岛上。
questions.answer: My grand villa is located on this island.

questions.title: 我们的分公司设立在拉斯维加斯。
questions.answer: Our branch office is located in Las Vegas.

questions.title: 我们赞助的希望小学坐落在山区。
questions.answer: The hope project primary school which we have supported is located in themountain area.

questions.title: 公司设在西海岸。
questions.answer: The company is located on the West Coast.

questions.title: 这座公园坐落在水边的小山上。
questions.answer: This park is located on the hill by the waterside.

answer.en: It is located to the east of Beijing.

title: ——你能带我去那所新医院吗？
——对不起，我没有时间带你去。它就在山顶上。

answer.en: Can you show me the way to the new hospital?
Sorry, I don't have enough time to show you there. It's situated on thetop of that hill.

title: ——我想要知道去北京的路。
——北京离这很远，它靠近天津市。

answer.en: I would like to know the way to Beijing.
It's too far from here. It's located next to Tianjin.
